lines.text: You know, I haven't been this excited since they invented the chicken nugget!
Oh, I have never been so insulted in my whole life... or death.
Richard, was the Lissy chasing Duane down the sidewalk or am I crazy?
Oh now, Candy, that's an unfair question.
Uh, no problem. I hope your husband didn't mind.
Oh no. After he ripped the phone cord off the wall, he went right back to sleep.
